titles.title: Urging the President to condition discussions about Turkey's foreign military finances on resolution of that nation's hostile occupation of the Republic of Cyprus.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Committee Agreed to Seek Consideration Under Suspension of the Rules, (Amended) by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/4/1999--Introduced. Calls on the President to condition any discussion: (1) of Turkey's debt relief or debt refinancing of foreign military finance direct or guaranteed loans on finding a solution to the Cyprus problem; and (2) pertaining to disbursement of Turkey's foreign military finance undisbursed direct or guaranteed loans on settlement of the Cyprus situation.
